parse.title: Mountain Live: The Road Goes Ever On

wikitext.*:
{{disambig-more|The Road Goes Ever On|[[The Road Goes Ever On (disambiguation)]]}}
'''''Mountain Live: The Road Goes Ever On''''' is a live album by the hard rock band '''Mountain''', released in 1972. It consists of two tracks recorded at the Woodstock Festival in [[1969]] and two songs recorded live in [[1972]]. Other than the title, which is taken from the [[The Road Goes Ever On (song)|poem of the same name]], its lyrics have nothing to do with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s work.

==Track listing==
# "Long Red"
# "Waiting To Take You Away"
# "Crossroader"
# "Nantucket Sleighride"
